column4: like... haii. My wi-fi card isn't working on the new kernel.. it was working on .22, but now on .24-7 it is not. Any way I can fix it?
Did your wifi card work "out of box" with .22?
Yeah.. It was even working on the live _cd
Hmm that's odd. What card is it?
Are they loaded? (lsmod)
No.
Try modprobe iwl4965
Hmm.. cd /lib/modules/
Then find | grep 4965
Ahh, right, you're on 24-7 now.. one sec
try find | grep iwl
Anything in the 24-7's that's close?
Yeh, its possible they moved the 4965 stuff into another kernel module
You still there?
Yeh.. I can see that the ubuntu 24-4 kernel has iwl4965, not -7 though..
Just trying to track down what happened to it
Are you on gusty?
No, hardy
I'm going to have to say check out #ubuntu+1
The file lists aren't up for a lot of the hardy packages
The last kernel with it in is -4, as far as I know
